  physical_appearance: \The image shows a digital print
 an artist\u0027s proof
 and a slide. They are rectangular in shape. The background of the digital print and artist\u0027s proof are black in colour. The images depict  a man who is bending forwards. In his hands is a thin stick that has a roller brush attached to it at one end. He is applying paint to the surface of a wall. The painter is wearing a yellow helmet and his face is not captured in the images. The image at the bottom shows a slide. It is in colour. It is held in place by a frame. On the borders of the frame
 \\The Painter\\ is stated at the top for the image at the bottom. \\Tan Lip Seng

metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a digital print, an artist's proof, and a slide. They are rectangular in shape. The background of the digital print and artist's proof are black in colour. The images depict  a man who is bending forwards. In his hands is a thin stick that has a roller brush attached to it at one end. He is applying paint to the surface of a wall. The painter is wearing a yellow helmet and his face is not captured in the images. The image at the bottom shows a slide. It is in colour. It is held in place by a frame. On the borders of the frame, ""The Painter"" is stated at the top for the image at the bottom. ""Tan Lip Seng
